title: 5G phones claim to be “faster”. How is phone “speed” defined? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is not the actual phones that are faster in relation to 5G. It is the speed of the internet that is faster. So for instance, Facebook on a 4G phone may take say 10 seconds to load, where as on a 5G phone it may take 6.5 seconds. Many people think that it’s the phones processing speed that is better but it is in fact it is the speed of the internet download that dictates how long it takes for many apps to load all the information on the page
